tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It’s always been a positive experience from start to finish of every appointment in Dr Sanjay's clinic. 
Invisalign really lives up to their name. I was immediately happy with how transparent they were and how easy they were to use and remove and I didn’t have to keep visiting my dentist. They fitted my lifestyle.They're comfortable and don't get in the way of normal activities like eating and chewing. 

Thanks to the Invisalign treatment and Dr Sanjay I now feel so much more confident.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******** ** **** *** after thorough research I booked an appointment with the doc for teeth alignment .Doc was extremely patient, friendly , ************* and gave me multiple options to consider and took the time out to explain the outcomes of every treatment procedure and recommended Invisalign...I have been having regular follow ups with doc n he has been kind enough to  hear out my concerns n feedback n clarify questions .!. I am half way through the treatment and with the visible results , i am very happy n satisfied already..can't wait to see the end results..thanks a ton doc..n ofcourse the staff is also very friendly n the clinic is like supersanitised n safe to visit even during these trying times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother slipped in the wash room and was badly hurt on her teeth and cheek bone. Though Dr was not available physically but he assisted us through assistant and suggested medicines to prevent tooth pain over phone call which is highly appreciated. I got an appointment the next day and was told to get the X ray done for tooth and cheek. I thank Dr. Sanjay and his team for timely assistance, although most Dr's insist for physical appointment without which no temporary workaround/solutions will be given over call.Thank you for for all the assistance provided when it was actually required.

review: My son had his lower jaw pushing outside. Consulted Dr.Sanjay and very much satisfied with the service. Even though I have to travel 30km from Sarjapur to hrbr layout due to his availability on weekends here, My sons health is more important and I get him here every month for his treatment. Very happy with the service and would recommend him for any orthopaedic orthodontics consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently got my braces treatment completed at the LV clinic. Dr Sanjay approach is very professional yet friendly. He makes his patients feel very comfortable and explains the matter in a detailed manner. Other doctors and staff members are very pleasant and approachable too. My experience at LV was very cordial. I would surely recommend this clinic to anyone for their dentistry concerns.

A very pleasant treatment indeed for a person who can be very paranoid of dental treatments. Thank you *Dr.Mythree* for understanding the patients' emotions as well while treating. The procedure was done with utmost care and patience and she also took the time to elaborately explain the issue to me. After a long time, I finally can say i found MY dentist.. My daughter absolutely loves her too.. Thank you Dr.Mythree once again...

Gayathry

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for tooth cleaning and stain removal. the doctor said that stains will not come for a year, but they are back in 4 months. this happened twice with them.
reply_text:
Hello Ma’am,
We are very sorry to hear about your experience.
According to our records its showing last you came for cleanup at 2019 and in 2021 march . 
Tooth cleaning or stain removal is recommended every 6 months to 1 year .
Stains are directly related to how much tea/coffee / green tea is consumed. Smoking also causes a lot of stains .
So it differs from patient to patient.
Looks like you have developed chromogenic bacteria ( repeated stain forming bacteria) 
We have a solution for this .
Please feel free to reach out to us , so we can find a process to work together for a solution of ur stains .
